original_text: It is a Jubilee year for the people. And they can eat only food that they take from the fields.
korean_text: 이는 희년이니 너희에게 거룩함이니라 너희는 밭의 소출을 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: It is a Jubilee year for the people.
And they can eat only food
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 오직 음식만 먹을 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: that they take from the fields.
